atk-abh03a35:2_3: tasmā asañciccāpi tesu vatthūsu vikopitesu ānantariko hotī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a35:2_9: avasesā pāṇātipātādayopi asañcicca bhaveyyu’’nti codanatthaṁ asañciccapāṇaṁ hantvātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a35:2_10: Itaro tathārūpāya laddhiyā abhāvena paṭikkhipati. Sesaṁ yathāpāḷimeva niyyāti.
atk-abh03a35:2_12: rogapaṭikārādikāle asañcicca ghātaṁ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a35:2_13: Nanu mātā jīvitā voropitāti pañhepi asañcicca voropitaṁ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādisseva.
atk-abh03a35:2_14: Evaṁ adhippāyaṁ pana aggahetvā hañcīti laddhipatiṭṭhāpanaṁ itarassa.
atk-abh03a35:2_15: Taṁ ayoniso patiṭṭhāpitattā appatiṭṭhitameva. Pitughātakādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a35:2_16: Saṅghabhedake pana dhammasaññiṁ sandhāya saṅghabhedo ānantarikoti pucchā sakavādissa, ‘‘saṅghaṁ samaggaṁ bhetvāna,
atk-abh03a35:2_17: kappaṁ nirayamhi paccatī’’ti vacanaṁ ayoniso gahetvā paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a35:2_18: Puna sabbeti puṭṭho sakapakkhe dhammasaññiṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a35:2_21: Nanu vuttaṁ bhagavatāti suttaṁ ekanteneva dhammavādissa ānantarikabhāvadassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a35:2_23: Itaro pana adhippāyaṁ aggahetvā laddhiṁ patiṭṭhapeti.
atk-abh03a35:5_2: Lokiyaṁ samāpattiñāṇampi hoti dānādivasena pavattaṁ kammassakatañāṇampi;
atk-abh03a35:5_4: Imaṁ pana vibhāgaṁ akatvā ‘‘saccaparicchedakameva ñāṇaṁ na itaraṁ,
atk-abh03a35:5_5: tasmā natthi puthujjanassa ñāṇa’’nti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi hetuvādānaṁ,
atk-abh03a35:5_6: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a35:5_8: Tenetaṁ dīpeti – yadi tassa ñāṇaṁ natthi, paññādayopi natthi. Atha paññādayo atthi, ñāṇampi atthi. Kasmā?
atk-abh03a35:5_12: Dukkhaṁ parijānātīti lokuttaramaggañāṇameva dīpeti, na ca lokuttarameva ñāṇanti.
atk-abh03a35:8_3: natthi nirayapālā nāma sattā’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a35:8_4: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a35:8_5: Atha naṁ ‘‘yadi tattha nirayapālā na siyuṁ, kammakāraṇāpi na bhaveyyuṁ.
atk-abh03a35:8_6: Kāraṇikesu hi sati kāraṇā’’ti codetuṁ natthi nirayesūtiādimāha.
atk-abh03a35:9_1: Yathā hi manussesu sati kāraṇikesu kāraṇā,
atk-abh03a35:9_3: Atthi nirayesūti pucchā paravādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a35:9_4: Na vessabhū nopi ca pettirājāti paravādinā sakasamayato suttaṁ ābhataṁ.
atk-abh03a35:9_5: Taṁ pana sāsanāvacarikanti sakavādinā anuññātaṁ. Tattha vessabhūti eko devo.
atk-abh03a35:9_6: Pettirājāti pettivisaye petamahiddhiko. Somādayo pākaṭā eva.
atk-abh03a35:9_7: Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – attano kammehi ito paṇunnaṁ paralokaṁ pattaṁ purisaṁ na ete vessabhūādayo hananti.
atk-abh03a35:9_8: Yehi pana so kammehi tattha paṇunno,
atk-abh03a35:9_9: tāni sakāni kammāniyeva naṁ tattha hanantīti kammassakataṁ dīpeti, na nirayapālānaṁ abhāvaṁ. Sakavādinā pana tamenaṁ,
atk-abh03a35:12_2: Tattha devesu erāvaṇādayo devaputtā hatthivaṇṇaṁ assavaṇṇaṁ vikubbanti, natthi tattha tiracchānagatā.
atk-abh03a35:12_3: Yesaṁ pana tiracchānavaṇṇino devaputte disvā ‘‘atthi devesu tiracchānagatā’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṁ ;
atk-abh03a35:12_4: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a35:12_6: tiracchānayoniyampi devā siyu’’nti codetuṁ atthi tiracchānagatesūtiādimāha.
atk-abh03a35:12_7: Kīṭātiādi yesaṁ so abhāvaṁ icchati, te dassetuṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a35:12_8: Erāvaṇoti pañhe tassa atthitāya paṭiññā sakavādissa , na tiracchānagatassa.
atk-abh03a35:12_11: Tattha yāvasikāti yavassa dāyakā. Kāraṇikāti hatthācariyādayo,
atk-abh03a35:15_1: Tattha yesaṁ ‘‘pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṁ vacīkammaṁ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī’’ti (a. ni.
atk-abh03a35:15_2: 3.431) idañceva suttaṁ sammāvācākammantājīvānañca cittavippayuttataṁ nissāya ‘‘nippariyāyena pañcaṅgikova maggo’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi mahisāsakānaṁ,
atk-abh03a35:15_3: te sandhāya pañcaṅgikoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sammāvācā maggaṅgaṁ,
atk-abh03a35:15_4: sā ca na maggotiādi parasamayavasena vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a35:15_6: Rūpattā pana maggo na hotīti vaṇṇitā.
atk-abh03a35:15_7: Sammādiṭṭhi maggaṅgantiādi maggaṅgassa amaggatā nāma natthīti dassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a35:15_8: Pubbeva kho panassāti sutte parisuddhasīlassa maggabhāvanā nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a35:15_9: na itarassāti āgamaniyapaṭipadāya visuddhibhāvadassanatthaṁ ‘‘kāyakammaṁ vacīkammaṁ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī’’ti vuttaṁ,
atk-abh03a35:15_11: Tenevāha ‘‘evamassāyaṁ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchatī’’ti.
atk-abh03a35:18_1: Tattha dhammacakkappavattane dvādasākārañāṇaṁ sandhāya ‘‘dvādasavatthukaṁ ñāṇaṁ lokuttara’’nti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaṁ,
atk-abh03a35:18_2: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a35:18_6: ekekasmiṁ sacce saccañāṇakiccañāṇakatañāṇānaṁ vasena ñāṇanānattaṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a35:18_8: Nanu vuttaṁ bhagavatāti suttaṁ saddhiṁ pubbabhāgaparabhāgehi ñāṇanānattaṁ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a35:18_9: na ariyamaggassa dvādasa ñāṇataṁ. Tasmā asādhakanti.
